keyMoments.title: Dorry's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Dorry encounters Luffy and Vivi on Little Garden and introduces himself as the strongest warrior of Elbaph.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the two legendary giant captains and co-founder of the Giant Warrior Pirates.
keyMoments.quote: I am Dorry, the strongest warrior of Elbaph!

keyMoments.title: The Century-Long Duel Explained
keyMoments.description: Dorry explains to Luffy and Vivi that he has been fighting Brogy for 100 years, with their duels resuming whenever the island's volcano erupts.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the central conflict of the Little Garden arc and demonstrates the giants' honor code.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Co-Captain
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Dorry was one of the two co-captains of the legendary Giant Warrior Pirates alongside Brogy.
keyMoments.significance: Adds depth to Dorry's backstory and establishes his historical importance as a legendary pirate.

bounties.reason: Co-captain of the legendary Giant Warrior Pirates, set a century ago

abilities.description: As a giant from Elbaph, Dorry possesses immense physical strength far beyond normal humans.

relationships.description: Dorry and Brogy are engaged in a century-long duel but were originally best friends and co-captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Dorry's rivalry with Brogy is revealed, though they maintain mutual respect as fellow warriors of Elbaph.

relationships.description: Dorry meets Luffy and Vivi on Little Garden and offers them hospitality.

evolutionMoments.description: Dorry meets Luffy and Vivi and begins to form a friendship based on mutual respect.

reveals.information: Co-captain of the legendary Giant Warrior Pirates from Elbaph
Possesses immense giant strength and warrior skills from Elbaph
100,000,000 berries bounty from a century ago

keyMoments.title: Brogy's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Brogy crashes through the jungle and encounters Nami and Usopp. After defeating a T. rex, he introduces himself as the strongest warrior of Elbaph.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the two legendary giant captains and the first character to mention Elbaph in the anime.
keyMoments.quote: I am Brogy! The strongest warrior of Elbaph!

keyMoments.title: Brogy Defeats Tyrannosaurus Rex
keyMoments.description: Brogy demonstrates his overwhelming strength by defeating a massive T. rex with a single strike of his axe.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the incredible power level of Elbaph's giant warriors.

keyMoments.title: First Mention of Elbaph
keyMoments.description: Brogy mentions Elbaph for the first time in the anime, introducing viewers to the legendary land of giants.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Elbaph, which becomes increasingly important throughout the series and eventually the setting for a major arc.
keyMoments.quote: I am the strongest warrior of Elbaph!

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Co-Captain
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Brogy was one of the two co-captains of the legendary Giant Warrior Pirates alongside Dorry.
keyMoments.significance: Adds depth to Brogy's backstory and establishes his historical importance as a legendary pirate.

bounties.reason: Co-captain of the legendary Giant Warrior Pirates, set a century ago

abilities.description: As a giant from Elbaph, Brogy possesses immense physical strength far beyond normal humans, capable of defeating dinosaurs with single strikes.

relationships.description: Brogy and Dorry are engaged in a century-long duel but were originally best friends and co-captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Brogy's rivalry with Dorry is revealed, though they maintain mutual respect as fellow warriors of Elbaph.

relationships.description: Brogy meets Nami and Usopp and offers them hospitality despite their initial fear.

evolutionMoments.description: Brogy encounters Nami and Usopp and attempts to befriend them despite scaring them initially.

relationships.description: Brogy meets Usopp and Nami and offers them hospitality, beginning what will become a meaningful connection for Usopp.

evolutionMoments.description: Brogy encounters Usopp and Nami and attempts to befriend them.

reveals.information: Co-captain of the legendary Giant Warrior Pirates from Elbaph
Possesses immense giant strength and warrior skills from Elbaph
100,000,000 berries bounty from a century ago
First character to mention Elbaph, the land of giants, in the anime
